TopicTitle: [ANSWERED] Is there any way to make a texture switcher for the stock fairings?

Articles.Content:
I'm a modeller not a modder, and I'm trying to make a texture switch for the stock fairings panels.

After investing hours into experimenting I realized that the auto-generated panels are not parts of the model file and thus can't be targeted with FSTextureSwitcher2 (Firespitter).

I'm wondering how to replace the textures of the fairings.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-12T13:54:06Z" title="07/12/2015 01:54  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 12, 2015</time> by Enceos**

Oh, great! Thank you so much! You definitely should make it a mod ) I can provide textures. Name it Stock Fairing Texture Switch, so people know it's for stock fairings.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-11T12:02:47Z" title="07/11/2015 12:02  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 11, 2015</time> by Enceos**
